Translations.Text: And if We had prescribed to them to kill yourselves (or each other) or leave your homes, only a few of them would have done it. But if they did what they were advised to it, it would have been better and more strengthening for them
Then We would certainly give them a great reward from Us
and We would certainly guide them to a straight path

And whoever obeys God and the messenger, then they are with those whom God favored upon them, among the prophets and the truthful ones and the witnesses (or the martyrs) and the righteous, and they are good friends
That is the grace from God, and God is sufficient for knowing
You who believe, use your precaution (and be careful) and go out in groups or go out all together
And indeed among you in one who shall slow down, and if a disaster strikes you he says: God has favored upon me that I was not present with them
And if Godâ€™s grace happens to you, he shall say as if there was no friendship between you and him: I wish I was with them so I would achieve a great victory
So those who sell this world's life for the hereafter should fight in God's way, and whoever fights in God's way, whether he is killed or he is victorious, then We will give him a great reward
